root.name: Frontline Tactics
root.description: OverviewFrontline Tactics is a tactical turn-based game; the player controls a squad of elite soldiers who have been deployed in the fictional Middle Eastern nation of Fahrahn. The game was released via Steam on October 26, 2012 under the free-to-play model.System RequirementsPCMinimumOS: Windows 7 / Vista / XPCPU: 1 GHzRAM: 1 GB RAMGPU: 256 MB of RAMHDD: 300 MB HD spaceMacMinimumOS: OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6 or laterCPU: Intel 1 GHzRAM: 1 GB RAMGPU: 256 MB of RAMHDD: 300 MB HD space

similar_games.game: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Shadow Wars
